attributes.action: Sadiq Khan to run for Prime Minister in upcoming referendum.
attributes.background: We strongly encourage Sadiq Khan to run for Prime Minister after David Cameron's recent resignation, as he has shown during the EU referendum fairness, calmness and other qualities we, as a country, need in a leader.

rejection.details: In any case, as you might already know, the Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.
